header.title: Samsung Galaxy S6 Android Phone Specs
header.metaDescription: Discover the Samsung Galaxy S6 Android phone and purchase online now. The Samsung Galaxy S6 is available with an unlimited, prepaid, no contract plan from Boost Mobile.
header.metaKeywords: samsung galaxy s6 specs, cell phone, prepaid, no contract, samsung galaxy s6

descriptions.list-description: Meet the reimagined Samsung Galaxy S<sup class="rm">®</sup> 6. Featuring an incredibly fast octa-core processor, Android™ 5.1 and a 5.1" super AMOLED™ display, the Galaxy S 6 has it all. Its innovative dual-edge display features stunning metal and sophisticated glass - so it's got toughness as well as good looks.
descriptions.list-extended: Meet the reimagined Samsung Galaxy S 6. Featuring an incredibly fast octa-core processor, Android 5.1 and a 5.1" super AMOLED display, the Galaxy S 6 has it all. Its innovative dual-edge display features stunning metal and sophisticated glass - so it's got toughness as well as good looks. The Samsung Exynos 7420 Octa-Core 64-bit processor allows for jaw-dropping graphics and lightning-quick switching between apps. Enjoy bright images and full HD video on the go with this crisp 5.1" Quad HD Super AMOLED screen and rich color display. Capture crystal-clear photos and videos every time with the 16MP rear-facing and 5MP front-facing cameras with auto real-time HDR. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android 5.1 (Lollipop) operating system. Get up to 23 hours of talk time from the 2550 mAh long-lasting lithium-ion battery. Charge wirelessly with an optional wireless charging pad (sold separately). Keep your favorite music, videos and important files at your fingertips with 32GB of onboard memory. Switch seamlessly between Sprint's nationwide 3G and 4G LTE networks and the all-new Enhanced LTE network, where available.

feature.title: Android™ 5.1 (Lollipop)
feature.description: Fast, customizable, smooth. Enjoy the speed and simplicity of the powerful Android operating system.

feature.description: Enjoy bright images and full HD video on the go with this crisp screen and rich color display.

feature.description: Capture crystal-clear photos and videos every time w/ the 16MP rear-facing and 5MP front-facing cameras with auto real-time HDR.

feature.description: Turn your phone into a Wi-Fi® hotspot for as low as $5/mo. Learn more.

shrinkage.title: As low as $40
shrinkage.description: All Monthly Unlimited plans include Shrinking Payments. Shrinking Payments reduces your monthly payment by $5/month for every six on-time payments, up to $15/month in total.

legal.disclaimer-full: Promotional pricing available only for select phones directly from boostmobile.com. Limited time only, while supplies last. Android™ is a trademark of Google, Inc.
